contextId.occurrenceNote: Here Jehoshaphat speaks of the ironic situation. Alternate translation: "This is how they 'repay' us for the mercy we showed to them; they are coming to drive us out of your land" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-irony]])
contextId.glQuote: See how they are rewarding us; they are coming to drive us out of your land
